name: Adventure Island
description:
Master Higgins sets out on a quest through Adventure Island--a group of uncharted isles filled with caves, deserts, volcanoes, and glaciers. His princess has been kidnapped, and he is the only one who can save her! In his search, Master Higgins will need to
equip his skateboard and a variety of weapons as he fights his way through eight different worlds.

Grab food along the way for a recharge and avoid an untimely death! Find hidden eggs for fast shortcuts and bonus items! Enlist the aid of dinosaurs as you take to the skies, or shoot fireballs at unsuspecting foes! The search for the princess will be the adventure of a lifetime!
